title: They Haven’t Learned
author: VD
content_html:
And they’re never going to, because destruction and demoralization are their primary objectives. Wizards of the Coast has introduced Black Aragorn, and at this point, it wouldn’t be a surprise to discover that Arwen is actually supposed to be a tranny.

DISCUSS ON SG
